channel.title: Posts on WNCBB's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on WNCBB's blog

item.title: hugo, github.io 搭建个人blog
item.description: 0x00 利用hugo, github.io, 搭建个人blog 0x01 在github上创建仓库: <git user name>.github.io 0x02 brew install hugo # or go get -u https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo hugo new site <site name> cd <site name> git submodule add <git of the theme you want> themes/<theme name> # 生成静态文件，在public里。然后把public里的文件推到<git user name>.github.io仓库中 hugo
